div.p: The Technology department at Palisades Park Public Schools recognizes that distance learning may have technical challenges that need to be resolved in order for students to continue to be successful. In order to support our students we can provide the following:
We understand that working technology is central to the success of distance learning during this time and will be working to best support students’ success with functional technology.
